Accessible Reading Assistant

- Single-file web app (one HTML file with inline CSS and JavaScript, no external libraries).
- Purpose: Enhance reading accessibility for users with visual and cognitive impairments by providing dynamic text customization and guided reading tools.
- Core features:
  - Adjustable text size, line height, letter spacing, and font choice with instant preview.
  - Color theme toggle: normal, high contrast (dark/light), and color inversion modes.
  - Reading guide overlay: horizontal highlight bar that can be moved via keyboard or mouse to aid focus.
  - Text-to-speech functionality triggered by keyboard shortcut and screen reader-friendly ARIA roles.
  - Import and export user settings and reading content via JSON files.
  - Share reading content and settings via URL hash encoding, enabling easy sharing of customized reading experiences.
- Accessibility and keyboard-first UX:
  - All controls operable via keyboard with logical tab order.
  - ARIA labels and roles for screen reader compatibility.
  - Focus indicators visible on all interactive elements.
  - Support for screen magnifiers and contrast preferences.
- Persistence:
  - User preferences and last opened text stored in localStorage for session continuity.
- UI:
  - Clean, minimal interface emphasizing content area.
  - Responsive layout adapting to various screen sizes.
- Additional:
  - Load plain text or pasted content for reading and customization.
  - Clear reset option to default settings.
  - Optional line-by-line auto-scrolling mode for hands-free reading, controllable via keyboard.
